title: In The Heart of Ohio City
posting_body: The unit is North of Bridge, right around the block from Johnny Mangos, Momocho Mod Mex, Mexican Restaurant, and a short walk from the West Side market, Lutheran Hospital, Dave’s, etc.
The unit is unique cozy (about 700 square feet)
There is newer flooring and an updated vanity with granite top.
There are newer energy efficient vinyl windows.
There is a new heating and central air conditioning unit.
There is small kitchen with dishwasher and apartment sized stove.
The unit has a large vaulted ceiling with skylights making it a great space for entertaining.
There is a coin operated washer/dryer on the premises.
There is fenced in backyard with a brick patio perfect for entertaining.
A security deposit of 1075.00 is required with first month's rent.
There is a 35.00 application fee which is credited if you are approved.
